00041 typedef struct _tagParameterNameValuePair
00042 {
00044         std::wstring Name;
00045 
00047         std::wstring Value;
00048 
00053         _tagParameterNameValuePair operator=(_tagParameterNameValuePair param) { Name = param.Name; Value = param.Value; return *this; }
00054 
00060         bool operator==(_tagParameterNameValuePair param) { if (param.Name == Name) return true; return false; }
00061 
00067         bool operator==(const std::wstring &name) { if (Name == name) return true; return false; }
00068 } ParameterNameValuePair;
00069

00072 
00074 typedef std::list<ParameterNameValuePair> ParameterNameValuePairList;

00082 
00084         std::wstring Value;
00085

00094         {
00095                 Name = param.Name;
00096                 Value = param.Value;
00097                 ControlledVocabulary = param.ControlledVocabulary;
